com.workday.jersey

Class schemaFilesService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.workday.jersey.schemaFilesService

  • @Path(value="schemas")
public class schemaFilesService
extends java.lang.Object
    Getting a JSON object containing the names of all available schemas from SVN url: /ValidateService/webapi/schemas/options Getting a SVN schema file's content as a string url: /ValidateService/webapi/schemas/getSchema
    Since:
    8.25.2015
    Author:
    Elisa Yan

@Consumes(value="text/plain")

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSchemaFileContent(@QueryParam(value="option")
                                                                        java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                        @QueryParam(value="svnPathToFile")
                                                                        java.lang.String svnPathToFile)
